entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
